overview:
Kyle King is the CEO of NexusSTOR. NexusSTOR.com is a value added provider for storage & back-up appliances.

NexusSTOR provides solutions from partners such as Unitrends, Nimble Storage, ARTEC EMA, and Nexsan. They specialize in SAN Appliances, NAS appliances, Unified Appliances, Disk Backup Appliances, DeDuplication Appliances, Archiving Appliances, CDP Appliances, and VDT Storage appliances
